WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for logging this issue. We've moved to a new codebase on GitHub; please try your issue against the new compiler (once possible) and log an issue on the GitHub site if it still reproduces
WorkItem.Description: hello... one issue that still has not been fixed with TS is that on occasion when trying to rename refactor we continue getting the error "rename task took more than 2 second... try later"... i have attached a screenshot example... any ideas on how to fix this? after enough restarts, prayer, and hail marys, it eventually works but it's terribly annoying... i think 2 seconds is an unreasonable limit for some code bases... it all depends on what you are renaming... is there any way to bump this limit up??? thanks again...
WorkItem.Summary: rename task took more than 2 seconds...

Comments.Message: hi all... i just wanted to let you all know that this issue persists even after vs 2013 update 2...
